channel.title: Right click quest tab
channel.description: How do you go about making it so when you right click the quest tab it doesn't show the names? I assume the interface is one of the original ones/is packed . Surely there is some sort of way?

item.title: Right click quest tab
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’m sure you could modify a packet to work like sendFrame126 does and have it send 2 strings, one for the actual text, and another for the right click.

Read full topic

item.title: Right click quest tab
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:519193”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=637651.msg4298080#msg4298080 date=1368554722]
That’s correct but I am talking about all the other text when you right click like the quests and stuff. Those aren’t in that interface ~^
[/quote]
What text then? The only text I know is what I showed above, and when you right click and it says “View Quest”[/quote]I got it now

I sort of feel stupid lols

you have to use developers debug…get the interface id and go to the client and have it do the same as you posted above for the other stuff. I am just putting " " for now.

Read full topic

item.title: Right click quest tab
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:3, topic:519193”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=637651.msg4297934#msg4297934 date=1368531953]
Wait what would you want showing when you right click it? Because something has to show.
Typically it’s edited on the client side though. Server sided can change the name, but from what I know there’s no packet to edit the other text, but I could be wrong.
[/quote]I haven’t decided yet but the quest tab will be used for custom quests(maybe? Not entirely sure yet… A friend of mine pointed it out to me other day and I couldn’t find anything relating to it. I figured it was server sided cause I know you can remove the text itself via server side. I will ask for a move sorry.

Could you supply the client portion that I need to look at please?

edit: this is interesting I am not seeing a reference to any of those names either it must be something in rsinterface? :o[/quote]
Uhm let me go download a server real fast and I’ll see, I’m at school so I can’t access my stuff

Edit:

in RSInterfaces.java in the quest tab method, there’s something that will look like:
addHoverText(39166, “Removed link”, “Register”, TDA, 0, 16711680, false, true, 150);
See where it says register? That’s the text that pops up in the corner, and I believe if you right click.

Read full topic

Server sided can change the name, but from what I know there’s no packet to edit the other text, but I could be wrong.[/quote]I haven’t decided yet but the quest tab will be used for custom quests(maybe? Not entirely sure yet… A friend of mine pointed it out to me other day and I couldn’t find anything relating to it. I figured it was server sided cause I know you can remove the text itself via server side. I will ask for a move sorry.

Could you supply the client portion that I need to look at please?

edit: this is interesting I am not seeing a reference to any of those names either it must be something in rsinterface? :o
